title: Clinic Location
content: We are located at 123 Health Street, Springfield. The nearest landmark is Central Mall.

title: Parking Information
content: Free parking is available in the clinic basement for up to 2 hours. Street parking is also available.

title: Hours of Operation
content: Our clinic is open Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays.

title: Accepted Insurance
content: We accept Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, Medicare, and most major providers. Please bring your insurance card.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept cash, credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. Co-pays are due at the time of service.

title: Cancellation Policy
content: We request at least 24 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a fee.

title: Visit Preparation
content: Please bring a government-issued ID, your insurance card, a list of current medications, and any prior medical reports relevant to your visit.
